parameter.name: NetworkTimeout
parameter.description: Timeout for blocking network calls (in seconds). Use -1 for no timeout.

parameter.name: TargetPort
parameter.description: Port used by the SMB service

parameter.name: UsingNbt
parameter.description: Boolean stating to use Nbt or not

parameter.name: UsingNbt
parameter.description: Boolean stating to use Nbt or not

parameter.name: Pipe
parameter.description: Test an additional pipe to see if it is accessible (optional)

parameter.name: Share
parameter.description: Test a file share to see if it is accessible (optional), entered as hex bytes (in unicode)

paramgroup.name: Blank
paramgroup.description: User account with no password set

parameter.name: Username
parameter.description: Username entered as hex bytes (in unicode)

parameter.description: Username entered as hex bytes (in unicode)

parameter.description: Password entered as hex bytes (in unicode)
